title: A Story About Armored King and Captive Princess
description:
This is a love story about two people who chose to give up their lives and live as different people.

matches.title: The boy who ended up crossdressing to act as someone else's girlfriend
A Story about a boy who crossdresses every day for the sake of his favourite female teacher.
